recipe.title: Eggy Potato Salad with Pickles
ingredients: 1/4 cup sweet pickle juice from jar
1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper plus more
instructions: Place potatoes in a large pot. Add water to cover by 2", season with salt, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook until potatoes are tender when pierced with a knife, 20-30 minutes. Drain. Place potatoes in a large bowl and let cool slightly. Meanwhile, whisk mayonnaise, pickle juice, Dijon mustard, sugar, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, and 1 1/4 teaspoons salt in a small bowl for dressing. Using a large wooden spoon, coarsely smash potatoes, leaving some larger pieces mixed with some well-mashed pieces. Add dressing and egg yolks to potatoes and toss to coat, coarsely smashing egg yolks. Add onion and parsley; gently mix to incorporate. Season to taste with more salt and pepper, if desired. DO AHEAD: Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill. Divide potato salad among small paper cups or bowls; dust with paprika. Top each serving with a pickle chip.
